Source code for viber.error

[docs]class ViberError(Exception):
    pass




[docs]class InvalidToken(ViberError):
    def __init__(self):
        super(InvalidToken, self).__init__('Invalid token')




[docs]class NetworkError(ViberError):
    pass



[docs]class ApiVersionError(ViberError):
    pass



[docs]class BadRequest(NetworkError):
    pass




[docs]class TimedOut(NetworkError):

    def __init__(self):
        super(TimedOut, self).__init__('Timed out')



[docs]class InvalidWebhookUrl(NetworkError):
    pass



[docs]class Unauthorized(ViberError):
    pass



[docs]class RetryAfter(ViberError):
    def __init__(self, retry_after):
        super(RetryAfter,
              self).__init__('Flood control exceeded. Retry in {} seconds'.format(retry_after))
        self.retry_after = float(retry_after)
